If you are playing as the first player (X), then you can win by following these steps:
1. Play your O in the center of the board (on row 3). This will create two connected Os that form a "T" shape.
2. Your opponent (Y) will respond by placing an O on either side of your O to try to block it. Let's say they place their O on the left and right sides of your O, like this:
```css
   |    |  
0   0  X   
-----------
0   0   0   
-----------
0   0  X   
   |    |  
```
1. You then play your next move directly above your original O, like this:
```scss
   |    |  
0   0  X   
-----------
0   0   0   
-----------
0   0  X   
   |  XX|  
```
This creates three connected Os that form an inverted L-shape.
2. Your opponent will again attempt to block your move by placing an O to the left or right of your new O. Let's say they place it to the left, like this:
```less
   |    |  
0   0  X   
-----------
0   0   0  X
-----------
0   0  X   
   |XXO|  
```
1. Finally, you finish off your opponent by placing your last O in the bottom-right corner of the board:
```python
   |    |  
0   0  X   
-----------
0   0   0  X
-----------
0   0  X   
   |XXO|  
       ^^^^
```
This forms four connected Os that span the entire width of the
